issue.subject: Multilanguage "Terms of Use"
issue.description: In EasySDI SHOP configuration we have the "terms of use"-option. A relative or an absolute link can be placed there. Is there any possiblity to enter a link for each language present in joomla (e.g. french and german)? If not, is that a possible enhancement?

journals.notes:
Hi Peter,
Sorry for the late reply.

This is currently not possible, because it's stored in the 'com_config' Joomla native storage. It does not support translation.

+It would need a small dev to make it multilingual.+

I suppose it has not been done because the rest of the SHOP (Basket etc) is not fully multilingual.

Do you use SHOP for download only, or do you plan to use it with the full basket functionality ?

Hi Yves

we only use the SHOP for download and we have an acceptable workaround (linking to a pdf file containing informations in both languages). So there's no urgency in this.

Thanks
Peter
Thanks Peter, we'll keep your issue open
